channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-12545] Hadoop javadoc has broken links for AccessControlList, ImpersonationProvider, DefaultImpersonationProvider, and DistCp
item.description:
1) open hadoop-2.7.1\share\doc\hadoop\api\index.html
2) Click on "All Classes"
3) Click on "AccessControlList", The page shows "This page can’t be displayed"
Same error for DistCp, ImpersonationProvider and DefaultImpersonationProvider also.

Javadoc generated from Trunk has the same problem
item.summary: Hadoop javadoc has broken links for AccessControlList, ImpersonationProvider, DefaultImpersonationProvider, and DistCp

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
1. For AccessControlList,ImpersonationProvider and DefaultImpersonationProvider::
    Package of these classes is annotated as 
    @InterfaceAudience.LimitedPrivate({"HBase", "HDFS", "MapReduce"})

    but these classes are annotated as 

    @InterfaceAudience.Public

    These two contradicting annotations causing the broken link problem
    To fix the problem we have to either mark the package as Public or mark classed as LimitedPrivate.
    Any suggestion which one is more appropriate?

  2. For DistCp:
    DistCp has the same problem as above.
    Package of DistCp class is annotated as @InterfaceAudience.Private but DistCp is annotated as @InterfaceAudience.Public
    To fix the problem we have to either mark the package as Public or mark DistCp as Private.
    Any suggestion which one is more appropriate?
Changed package annotation to @InterfaceAudience.Public

-1 overall

arshad.mohammad, FYI, you should use target-version for your intention. Fix-version is set at commit time. I'm fixing this for now.
Moving out all non-critical / non-blocker issues that didn't make it out of 2.7.2 into 2.7.3. Please revert back if you disagree.
LGTM, +1. Thanks arshad.mohammad.

Cancelling my +1. Would you remove @Public from hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java and add @Public to hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java? Since DistCp is in hadoop-distcp package, it's better to add the annotation there.
Thanks ajisakaa for your review comment. Added @Public to hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java. Submitted HADOOP-12545-02.patch

Thanks arshad.mohammad for updating the patch. With the patch, mvn site fails on JDK8.

[ERROR] /Users/aajisaka/git/hadoop/hadoop-tools/hadoop-distcp/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java:26: error: package org.apache.hadoop.tools has already been annotated
[ERROR] @InterfaceAudience.Public
[ERROR] ^

Would you remove @Private from hadoop-common-project/hadoop-common/src/main/java/org/apache/hadoop/tools/package-info.java to fix the error?
